COMMENT: Here you will find some products and code samples I've worked in. Check them out or contact me to have access to the GitHub repos (when available).

DESCRIPTION.BRIEF: This very website. A minimalist one-pager with a touch of color.
DESCRIPTION.FULL: Inspired by the former Vercel website, I built this site as my online cv in 2021. Lately it has served me as a fantastic excercise to keep up with the changes on NextJS framework.

DESCRIPTION.BRIEF: Check all your favorite band art covers, beautifully ordered and on a Trello board.
DESCRIPTION.FULL: Coded as an interview exercise, this node app focus on API integration, featuring Spotify and Trello.

DESCRIPTION.BRIEF: Find an appartment to rent, subscription free!
DESCRIPTION.FULL: This repo won't get any praise for its code, but it got me an appartment in one of the best neighborhoods of Berlin. Given some parameters, like where and when, it scraps an inmobilia website, search for the new listings that meet that criteria and sends them into a telegram group. It proved to be faster and more reliable than any subscription.

DESCRIPTION.BRIEF: A proof of concept on LinkedIn automatization. Say hi to your contacts from the command-line!
DESCRIPTION.FULL: This node app lets you log into LinkedIn and send messages to your contacts from the command line using Puppeteer.
